meanings.definition: To remove or mask unpleasant odors.
meanings.sent1: I used a spray to deodorize the smelly shoes.
meanings.sent2: She deodorized the room by lighting a scented candle.
meanings.sent3: The skunk tried to deodorize itself by rolling in flowers.
meanings.sent4: His jokes always deodorize a tense situation.
meanings.sent5: The air freshener worked wonders to deodorize the musty closet.

meanings.definition: To make something smell fresh and clean.
meanings.sent1: After cleaning, she used a spray to deodorize the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The laundry detergent helped deodorize the dirty clothes.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to deodorize the kitchen after burning the toast.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to deodorize the gloomy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the vase deodorize the room with a pleasant scent.
